data.name: Border Town
data.detailed_description:
2D top down view open world sandbox survival farming game.
Survive, adventure, hunt, gather resources, craft, build, farm, fish, trade, become an adventurer, complete various tasks and explore this fantasy world.

Go on an adventure on a large randomly generated map, do whatever you want. you can become an adventurer, explore the wild, dig caves, hunt beasts, fight monsters, or or just relax anywhere you want to fish, farm, raise animals, go to the town to make friends with other people, or deal with those profiteers. Be a most famous adventurer, gourmet, millionaire, or just want to be an ordinary Farmers, the choice is yours.

Story:
You passed out in the forest and saved by a kind old man. Because of amnesia, you were taken in by the old man and lived together. From then on, you started a new life, and a path that may be completely different from the previous one in front of you.

Features:
Random Large Map,Explore,Adventure


Wood, ore, various resources are abundant
Collect resources


The entire large map is at your arrange
Synthesis, construction


Life, farming, harvest, fishing


Raise animals,Let your animals follow, work, fight, ride


If you want to get more jobs, then join the adventure union


Grab the weapon and fight the enemy


Need labor? Then build empty rooms, recruit NPCs


Use your hands
Create a home

data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window7
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: Intel I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
